name: leaflet-coverage
description: A Leaflet plugin for visualizing coverage data

scripts.build: npm run buildsrc && npm run buildmin
scripts.buildsrc: jspm bundle-sfx leaflet-coverage/classic - leaflet - c3 - covutils + ndarray leaflet-coverage.src.js --globals "{leaflet:'L', c3:'c3', 'covutils/lib/validate.js':'CovUtils.validate', 'covutils/lib/constants.js':'CovUtils.constants', 'covutils/lib/array.js':'CovUtils.array', 'covutils/lib/range.js':'CovUtils.range', 'covutils/lib/i18n.js':'CovUtils.i18n', 'covutils/lib/parameter.js':'CovUtils.parameter', 'covutils/lib/unit.js':'CovUtils.unit', 'covutils/lib/coverage/create.js':'CovUtils.coverage.create', 'covutils/lib/coverage/transform.js':'CovUtils.coverage.transform', 'covutils/lib/coverage/subset.js':'CovUtils.coverage.subset', 'covutils/lib/coverage/referencing.js':'CovUtils.coverage.referencing', 'covutils/lib/domain/referencing.js':'CovUtils.domain.referencing', 'covutils/lib/domain/polygon.js':'CovUtils.domain.polygon'}" --format global --skip-source-maps
scripts.buildmin: jspm bundle-sfx leaflet-coverage/classic - leaflet - c3 - covutils + ndarray leaflet-coverage.min.js --minify --globals "{leaflet:'L', c3:'c3', 'covutils/lib/validate.js':'CovUtils.validate', 'covutils/lib/constants.js':'CovUtils.constants', 'covutils/lib/array.js':'CovUtils.array', 'covutils/lib/range.js':'CovUtils.range', 'covutils/lib/i18n.js':'CovUtils.i18n', 'covutils/lib/parameter.js':'CovUtils.parameter', 'covutils/lib/unit.js':'CovUtils.unit', 'covutils/lib/coverage/create.js':'CovUtils.coverage.create', 'covutils/lib/coverage/transform.js':'CovUtils.coverage.transform', 'covutils/lib/coverage/subset.js':'CovUtils.coverage.subset', 'covutils/lib/coverage/referencing.js':'CovUtils.coverage.referencing', 'covutils/lib/domain/referencing.js':'CovUtils.domain.referencing', 'covutils/lib/domain/polygon.js':'CovUtils.domain.polygon'}" --format global --skip-source-maps
